channel.description: Installing Xorg The easiest way to install Xorg on top of Salix Core is to install everything under the /x repository directory. To do that, first update your package database slapt-get -uand then run: slapt-get --install-set xThat will install every package that is in the /x directory and will give you a working Xorg.
